statements: UPDATE user_authentication SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_authentication SET username='new_username', password='new_password' WHERE email='oldemail@example.com';
UPDATE user_authentication SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_authentication SET username = 'johndoe', password = 'newPassword', first_name = 'Jane', email = 'jane.smith@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'new_password' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE investment_accounts SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE user_id = 'f5ae4ecf-c5b1-4aae-b9d7-71d4c97d6277';
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'newpassword' WHERE username = 'user1';
UPDATE investment_accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.50 WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'user2');
